function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unspecified skin and eye symptoms attributed to germicidal UV-C radiation","Impact":"Health risks for surgical staff","Mitigation":"Provide annual UV-C and personal protective equipment (PPE) training, medical screening, and ensure the use of required PPE","Technologies":"Alternative infection control technologies, such as laminar airflow","People":"Surgical staff in orthopedic operating rooms","Owner":"Brigham and Women's Hospital (BWH)"},{"Description":"Tampering with UVGI lamp controls","Impact":"Unsafe exposure to UV-C radiation","Mitigation":"Secure UVGI lamp controls and provide training on safe operation","Technologies":"Control and monitoring systems for UVGI lamps","People":"Staff responsible for operating room maintenance","Owner":"Brigham and Women's Hospital (BWH)"},{"Description":"Discontinuation of UVGI without alternative infection control measures","Impact":"Risk of increased intraoperative infections","Mitigation":"Implementation of alternative infection control technologies, such as laminar airflow","Technologies":"Laminar airflow systems","People":"Patients in orthopedic operating rooms","Owner":"Brigham and Women's Hospital (BWH)"}]}
